mapper.select: SELECT proj_seq, title, user, thumbnail FROM codefolio.proj WHERE replace([p.title], ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT_WS('%',#{keyword},'%') OR replace([p.content], ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT_WS('%',#{keyword},'%') OR replace([p.stack], ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT_WS('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY p.proj_seq DESC LIMIT #{criteria.amount} OFFSET #{criteria.startNum}

SELECT p.proj_seq, p.title, p.user, f.file_name FROM codefolio.proj AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN file AS f ON f.board_seq = p.proj_seq WHERE p.title LIKE CONCAT_WS('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT_WS('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.proj_seq DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM codefolio.proj
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND `content` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR `content` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

select p.*, f.fileName from proj AS p left outer join ( select f1.file_seq as fSeq, f1.file_name as fileName, f1.board_seq AS pSeq from file as f1 left join file as f2 on f1.board_seq = f2.board_seq and f1.file_seq > f2.file_seq where f2.file_seq is null AND f1.board_type = 'proj' ) as f on p.proj_seq = f.pSeq order by p.proj_seq DESC limit 300;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codefolio.proj ( proj_seq, user, title, url, view ,stack, content, period, regDate ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(proj_seq), 0) + 1 FROM codefolio.proj A), #{user}, #{title}, #{url}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(view), 0) + 1 FROM codefolio.proj A), #{stack}, #{content}, #{period}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE codefolio.proj SET user = #{user}, title = #{title}, url = #{url}, stack = #{stack}, content = #{content}, period = #{period} WHERE proj_seq = #{projSeq}
